title: Marginal Totals of Young Populations
question_text: Category Own Rent Young (18-29) 18 32 Middle-Aged (30-49) 22 18 Older (50 and up) 27 13 The data chart above summarizes the responses of $130$ randomly selected individuals in response to the question “Do you own or rent your dwelling?” What is the marginal total for those in the Young category?
